forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 63. West southwest wind 12 to 22 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 56. West southwest wind 12 to 22 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the morning finds itself graced with mostly sunny skies that gently warm the air to a comfortable 63 degrees. A playful breeze meanders through the streets, carrying a hint of salt from the sea, reminding us of the wonderous coastline just beyond the horizon. The breeze, steady and brisk at times, dances between 12 to 22 mph—creating a pleasantly invigorating atmosphere that invites a leisurely stroll. As you look towards the Golden Gate, clarity is apparent, though there remains a hint of the marine layer just offshore, hinting at cooler evenings ahead.

As dusk approaches, temperatures will dip to about 56 degrees, and the sky will begin to don a cloak of partly cloudy blues and greys. It would be wise to layer your attire with a light sweater or jacket to keep the cool air at bay. This beautiful day beckons one to partake in mundane yet enriching activities; perhaps a leisurely coffee at a local café, where the aroma intertwines with fresh ocean air, or a quiet walk along the Embarcadero to witness the golden hues of the sunset reflecting off the Bay. Embrace the day’s charm, as it subtly shifts toward night, bringing with it whispers of warmth and tranquility.
